# Test Project Plan

## Overview

A test project for validating APS linter functionality.

## Problem & Success Criteria

**Problem:** Need to verify the APS linter catches common errors.

**Success Criteria:**

- [ ] All valid fixtures pass
- [ ] All invalid fixtures fail with expected errors

## Constraints

- Pure bash implementation
- No external dependencies

## Modules

| Module | Scope | Owner | Status |
|--------|-------|-------|--------|
| [auth](./modules/auth.aps.md) | AUTH | @test | Ready |
